Title: Rotating Knob control
Description: The c# programming language lacks a default WPF knob control. The following is a general purpose knob control.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The c# programming language lacks a default WPF knob control. The following is a general purpose knob control.



I've noticed there is no default knob in C# and no apparent or easy to use knob controls on the web, so I made one, 5 years ago. The code is relatively basic, but you can adapt it to your project. An example project is included.



The code is released under BSD license.
